work.summary:
- Fixed reported issues on existing mobile applications for iOS.
- Monitor and assign development tasks ensuring on time delivery and satisfactory output.

- Deployed to Samsung Electronics R&D Philippines.
- Debugged Samsung Mobile Print and Samsung Cloud Print reducing reported crashes and removing unexpected application behaviors.
- Optimized Samsung Mobile Print application reducing user waiting time on loading processes and improving overall user experience.
- Implemented new features for Samsung Mobile Print and adapted autolayout for the next major version of the application.

projects.name: Samsung Printing Applications (Samsung Mobile Print/ Samsung Cloud Print)
projects.description: A set of iOS applications for interfacing Samsung printers to allow printing, scanning, faxing, copying on a Samsung using iOS device.

work.summary:
- Redesigned existing but unpublished iOS application and added new features like requesting quotes via email, and successfully submitted the application to the App Store; Get Certified application.
- Overhauled and implemented a mocked up application for rating PMC store staff, adding features to add new staff and generate and save reports, also rebranded to be released to the App Store; Customer Experience Checklist application

projects.name: Get Certified
projects.description: A catalogue application for training services offered by the training center. Also allows requesting for quotation via email in app.

projects.name: Customer Experience Checklist
projects.description: A rating application for assessing skills of store staff and frontliners. The application presents a set of questions for each category to evaluate the staff, and accumulates score to get average rating. Also allows report generation, which can be exported to PDF file.

projects.name: Colour Chase
projects.description: A promotional game to showcase iOS development capabilities for the training center, and to encourage people to take the offered iOS app development training course.
